Small Library filled with an expansive collection of books bought, bribed and stolen from across the realm. Open to commoners and courtiers alike, improving knowledge and so increasing profits from superior craftsmanship

A structure putting even the fabled Sunken Library of Athena to shame, your collection of books range from the beginning of recorded time to the present, some books hidden deep within are even said to have been printed in the future...
